description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
Introducing +AI Meeting Notes in Spark!
Within Spark, you can easily transcribe and summarize your meetings – compatible with any meeting platform.
Never miss a meeting! Join in seconds without searching for the link again – Spark provides a pop-up reminder one minute before your meeting starts.
Transcribe meetings easily. Focus on the conversation while Spark handles the transcription in any meeting platform you choose, eliminating the need for manual note-taking.
Get instant AI-powered meeting summaries. Get a concise summary after the meeting, and customize its format anytime. Easily revisit all your meeting notes in one place in the sidebar folder.
Free plan includes five Meeting Notes transcriptions with AI summaries. With the Spark Premium subscription, you can use the feature without limitations.
Thank you for choosing Spark!
For any questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@sparkmailapp.com.
